A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Some great visuals and great performances by the very capable actors. However\, too long\, boring\, poorly paced. The B and C storylines needed to be scaled way back with whole characters that were unnecessarily introduced. Cool additions to the mythology still don't make up for the lack character development or incredibly lame plot. I personally don't understand how such a long and overstuffed film can make the Galaxy far far away feel so small. I'm going to stick with the Original Trilogy from now on.
